General.Name: Te Chang Construction Co Ltd
General.Description: Te Chang Construction Co., Ltd. engages in the construction contracting and civil engineering business. It undertakes various projects, such as public, commercial, and office building projects; hospital, school, and civil engineering projects; collective and public housing, and reconstruction of military dependents villages; and science and technology workshops, and other projects. Te Chang Construction Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.
